title: European markets climb on earnings boost as investors monitor Russian gas supplies to Europe; Stoxx 600 up 1%
content:
1. European markets climb on earnings boost as investors monitor Russian gas supplies to Europe; Stoxx 600 up 1%  CNBC
  2. EU accuses Russia of 'blackmail' after it cuts gas to Poland, Bulgaria  Fox News
  3. Russia cuts off gas supply to Poland and Bulgaria  Los Angeles Times
  4. What is the EU's stance on Russia's roubles gas payment demand?  Reuters
  5. Editorial: Russia is doing the west's work in cutting gas to Bulgaria and Poland  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 欧州市場は、ロシアの欧州向けガス供給を監視する投資家による業績押し上げで上昇、ストックス600は1%上昇
欧洲市场因收益提升而攀升，投资者关注俄罗斯对欧洲的天然气供应；斯托克600指数上涨1%。
歐洲市場因收益提升而攀升，投資者關注俄羅斯對歐洲的天然氣供應；斯托克600指數上漲1%。
